title: Tired little girl manages to snack AND doze as she travels in her car seat in adorable video
text:
Adorable little girl couldn't choose between taking a nap or finishing her french fries - so did both at the same time in a sweet clip.

The video, taken in Dallas, Texas, shows the toddler lying in her car seat.

She clutches onto a fry in her right hand as she slowly chews with her eyes shut.

Adorable little girl couldn't choose between taking a nap or finishing her french fries - so does both in a sweet clip, taken in Dallas, Texas, on August 14

She takes a big yawn before lifting her fist to her mouth.

With her eyes still shut she takes a large bite of the fry, ripping it away as she continues to chew.

The blonde-haired youngster is filmed by another passenger on August 14.

With her eyes still shut she takes a large bite of the fry, ripping it away as she continues to chew. The blonde-haired youngster is filmed by another passenger

This isn't the first time a sleepy tot was caught on camera snacking as they doze off.

Grayson was filmed in a restaurant in Seattle, Washington, falling asleep while eating fries in 2017.

Grayson munches on his meal but loses the battle to keep his eyes open.

The boy's dad asks him if he's finished eating and the toddler responds by letting his head fall forward before snapping back up, fighting to stay conscious.
description: Footage, taken in Dallas, Texas, shows the adorable toddler taking a big yawn. She clutches onto a fry in her right hand as she slowly chews with her eyes shut.
